6.  Kepler motion
Assume a central attracting mass at rest at the origin of R ^ and denote by M the product of that mass and the gravitational constant.  Let our mobile be subjected to this central attraction and perturbing forces We compute the generalized forces in corresponding to the central attraction from the potential
